name: Piramidal
headline: Foundation Model for the Brain
description: Get instant diagnosis for the vast majority of neurological conditions using our Foundational AI.

founders.name: Dimitris Fotis Sakellariou, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO at Piramidal. Spent four years at IQVIA shipping foundational AI code to production scaled for pharma and healthcare clients. Have conducted EEG research for 12 years, authored peer reviewed publications, spent more than four years in research hospitals conducting long-term EEG recordings, reviewing EEG recordings with expert epileptologists, participated in brain surgeries, and built capability around the brain. King's College London alum.

founders.name: Kris Pahuja, Founder
founders.description:
co-founder and all things product and business @piramidal.
previously product lead at google & spotify for ai and healthcare.
co-founded gyftgo and scaled to $1m arr.
At google, owned chrome os monetization from $0 to $300m arr.

piramidal
## About Piramidal
2024 marks 100 years since Hans Berger made the first EEG recording of the brain. Despite a century having passed, we still do not fully understand what brainwaves are telling us. From diagnostics to wellbeing, we are building technology that bridges the gap between research and real-world EEG applications.
  * [Arrow Right (Light)The team](https://piramidal.ai/<#team>)


piramidal
## Who we are
![](https://piramidal.ai)
### Dimitris Fotis Sakellariou
Founder & CEO
![](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/image02.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)
Dimitris holds a PhD in Neuroengineering and AI, and has conducted EEG research for 12 years at St Thomas' Hospital and King's College London. Additionally, brings four years of experience in shipping to production deep learning products for pharma and healthcare clients, as a Lead at IQVIA.
  * [LinkedInLinkedIn](https://piramidal.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/sacellarius/>)
  * [XX](https://piramidal.ai/<https:/twitter.com/dsacellarius>)


### Kris Pahuja
![](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/image01.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)
co-Founder & CBO
Kris is an expert in product and strategy, with significant roles at Google and Spotify. Led the content detection tool initiative at Spotify and drove Chrome OS's expansion into the healthcare market.
  * [LinkedInLinkedIn](https://piramidal.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/kris-pahuja-a59a905b/>)
  * [XX](https://piramidal.ai/<https:/twitter.com/KrisPahuja>)


### Advisors
### MichaiL Koutroumanidis
![](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/image04.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)
Head of Department and Clinical Lead of Epilepsy, St Thomas' Hospital London.Professor of Clinical Neurophysiology, King's College London.
  * [![Untitled](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/gallery03/670e2ac0.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)](https://piramidal.ai/<assets/images/gallery03/670e2ac0_original.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf>)


### Mark P Richardson
![](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/image09.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)
Vice Dean for Neuroscience, King’s College London.Head, Division of Neuroscience IoPPN, King’s College London.Paul Getty III Professor in Epilepsy, King’s College London.
  * [![Untitled](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/gallery04/8b754732.svg?v=5bb0a0bf)](https://piramidal.ai/<assets/images/gallery04/8b754732_original.svg?v=5bb0a0bf>)


### Carl Saab
![](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/image08.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)
Founder and Scientific Director, Cleveland Clinic Consortium for Pain.Professor of Neurosurgery & Neuroscience (Research), Brown University, Rhode Island.
  * [![Untitled](https://piramidal.ai/assets/images/gallery01/45ae1801.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf)](https://piramidal.ai/<assets/images/gallery01/45ae1801_original.jpg?v=5bb0a0bf>)


  * [Arrow Right (Light)Publications](https://piramidal.ai/<#publications>)

generated_description:
### Piramidal: Foundation Model for the Brain

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W24, Piramidal is an ambitious startup focused on revolutionizing the understanding and diagnosis of neurological conditions through advanced AI technology. With a mission centered around creating a **Foundation Model for the Brain**, their aim is nothing short of bridging the substantial gap between neuroscience research and real-world EEG applications.

#### The Vision

Piramidal's core offering begins with the ability to provide instant diagnostics for the majority of neurological conditions using their foundational AI. As we near the centenary of Hans Berger's first EEG recording, Piramidal addresses a pivotal challenge: we still don’t fully grasp what brainwaves are telling us. The technology they are developing promises to enhance diagnostic capabilities and contribute meaningfully to patient well-being.

#### The Team

Piramidal is led by a dynamic duo:

- **Dimitris Fotis Sakellariou**, Founder & CEO, boasts a PhD in Neuroengineering and AI and has over a decade of EEG research experience. Before founding Piramidal, he played a key role at IQVIA, shipping deep learning products to the healthcare sector.

- **Kris Pahuja**, co-Founder & CBO, supports this mission with a rich background in product strategy from notable positions at Google and Spotify, including leading initiatives that intersect technology and healthcare.

Both Dimitris and Kris are supported by an impressive roster of advisors, including leaders in clinical neuroscience and neurology from institutions like King's College London and the Cleveland Clinic.

#### The Journey Ahead

With just two full-time employees at the helm, Piramidal is leaning into innovation, aiming to catalyze significant breakthroughs in the neurological field. To learn more about their work, check out their website: [Piramidal.ai](https://piramidal.ai).

As they navigate this complex landscape of brain science and AI, Piramidal has the potential to turn scientific research into practical applications that can change lives. In an age where understanding our own biology is crucial, they’re setting out to decode our brainwaves and improve health outcomes, one AI model at a time.
